title: How to Make an Origami Flying Swan

steps.title: Position paper in the portrait orientation.
steps.content: Position paper in the portrait orientation.

steps.title: Fold the lower right corner across to the left side.
steps.content: Fold the lower right corner across to the left side. When finished, the bottom edge of the paper should now be flush with the left edge.

steps.title: Fold the excess paper down over the top of the triangle fold you just made.
steps.content: Fold the excess paper down over the top of the triangle fold you just made.

steps.title: Open the last fold and trim the excess.
steps.content: Open the last fold and trim the excess. You should now have a square piece of paper.

steps.title: Fold the crease on top of itself and then unfold.
steps.content: Fold the crease on top of itself and then unfold. You should have a piece of paper with an "X" fold when finished.

steps.title: Flip the paper over, fold across the horizontal axis, and unfold.
steps.content: Flip the paper over, fold across the horizontal axis, and unfold.

steps.title: Fold the paper across the vertical axis and unfold.
steps.content: Fold the paper across the vertical axis and unfold. Note: Green guide lines are for reference in the next step.

steps.title: Bring the edges of the 4 diagonal folds together.
steps.content: Bring the edges of the 4 diagonal folds together. This corresponds to the green guide lines in the image above.

steps.title: With the diagonal folds together, fold the two adjacent folds on each side onto each other to create a square.
steps.content: With the diagonal folds together, fold the two adjacent folds on each side onto each other to create a square.

steps.title: Position the square from Part 1 so that the crease runs vertically and the open end is facing down.
steps.content: Position the square from Part 1 so that the crease runs vertically and the open end is facing down.

steps.title: Fold the right side flap inwards.
steps.content: Fold the right side flap inwards.

steps.title: Repeat the last step for the left side.
steps.content: Repeat the last step for the left side.

steps.title: Fold the top triangle down on top of the last two folds.
steps.content: Fold the top triangle down on top of the last two folds.

steps.title: Unfold the last three folds.
steps.content: Unfold the last three folds.

steps.title: Carefully peel back the first layer of paper at the bottom and open it upwards.
steps.content: Carefully peel back the first layer of paper at the bottom and open it upwards.

steps.title: After opening upwards, fold the paper on the creases that were made in steps 2, 3, and 4.
steps.content: After opening upwards, fold the paper on the creases that were made in steps 2, 3, and 4.

steps.title: Crease the opposite side in the same way as the previous step.
steps.content: Crease the opposite side in the same way as the previous step.

steps.title: Flip the paper over and fold the right side flap inwards.
steps.content: Flip the paper over and fold the right side flap inwards.

steps.title: Repeat with the left side flap.
steps.content: Repeat with the left side flap.

steps.title: Fold the top flap downwards.
steps.content: Fold the top flap downwards.

steps.title: Unfold the last three folds.
steps.content: Unfold the last three folds.

steps.title: Carefully peel back the first layer of paper at the bottom and open it upwards.
steps.content: Carefully peel back the first layer of paper at the bottom and open it upwards.

steps.title: Fold the left side inward over the creases.
steps.content: Fold the left side inward over the creases.

steps.title: Repeat with the right side.
steps.content: Repeat with the right side.

steps.title: Confirm that you now have a diamond-shaped paper with two free lower flaps.
steps.content: Confirm that you now have a diamond-shaped paper with two free lower flaps.

steps.title: Fold the right section upwards behind itself diagonally.
steps.content: Fold the right section upwards behind itself diagonally.

steps.title: Repeat with the left section.
steps.content: Repeat with the left section.

steps.title: Carefully unfold the crease in the right section and open the fold.
steps.content: Carefully unfold the crease in the right section and open the fold.

steps.title: With the fold open, fold the right section upwards into itself so that the section extends from the inside of the body.
steps.content: With the fold open, fold the right section upwards into itself so that the section extends from the inside of the body.

steps.title: Repeat steps 12 and 13 with the left section
steps.content: Repeat steps 12 and 13 with the left section

steps.title: Carefully pull the right section downwards to reduce the angle and re-crease.
steps.content: Carefully pull the right section downwards to reduce the angle and re-crease.

steps.title: Fold the left section downward to create a head shape.
steps.content: Fold the left section downward to create a head shape.

steps.title: Fold the left wing down and crease.
steps.content: Fold the left wing down and crease.

steps.title: Flip over and repeat with the right wing.
steps.content: Flip over and repeat with the right wing.

steps.title: Pinch the breast area of the swan with your left hand and the middle portion of the tail with your right hand.
steps.content: Pinch the breast area of the swan with your left hand and the middle portion of the tail with your right hand.

steps.title: Carefully pull diagonally towards the tip of the tail with your right hand.
steps.content: Carefully pull diagonally towards the tip of the tail with your right hand. This should cause the wings to flap. Congratulations, you've just created a flapping swan!
